title: Apple and Cheese Tea Sandwiches
notes: Rustic Alpine is a vegan cheese from Miyoko's Creamery. Substitute Dubliner to de-veagn-ize
steps: Toast the bread and cut it into the desired shape, removing crusts.
Spread a thin layer cheese on each slice of bread - it has a strong flavor, so be moderate.
Layer apple slices, and close the sandwich
